text:
Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Property Opens in Washington County Published on : Tuesday, July 21, 2015
Hilton Worldwide announced the opening of Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton California University-Pittsburgh, its newest property to join Hampton by Hilton, the global brand of more than 2,000 mid-priced Hampton Inn by Hilton, Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton and Hampton by Hilton hotels. The 85-room hotel, located at 200 Technology Drive, is managed by Marshall Hotels and Resorts.
Located on North California Drive, just a few miles from PA-88, Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton California University-Pittsburgh is nearby popular area attractions including California University of Pennsylvania, Motordrome Speedway and hiking trails along the nearby Monongahela River.
“Washington County is a beautiful region for adventure, entertainment and history. California was established in 1849 and has preserved much of its history since, including the very first house built in the town,” said Marianne Linder, general manager. “We are excited to join this celebrated area and welcome business and leisure travelers alike to our new location.”
Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton California University-Pittsburgh offers amenities such as free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour business center with complimentary printing, a 702 square foot meeting space that can accommodate up to 45 people and a fitness center. The hotel also features Art Deco design, natural lighting and an indoor heated pool. The hotel provides free On the House hot breakfast as well as Hampton’s On the RunTM Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday.
The new hotel features the Perfect Mix Lobby, designed as an extension of the guestroom with a variety of seating and lighting options for both leisure and business travelers. Additionally, the hotel features Suite Shop, a food and beverage shop filled with snacks, toiletries, local merchandise and drinks for purchase.
Guestrooms are equipped with the brand’s signature Clean and fresh Hampton bed®, flat screen LCD TV, lap desk, work space and coffeemaker. Inviting suites are also available, offering additional space and a comfortable sleeper sofa.
Hampton by Hilton team members proudly exhibit a unique culture described as Hamptonality. This term describes each hotel’s approach to friendly customer service and anticipation of guests’ needs and providing travelers with helpful suggestions about area attractions, historical facts and fun things to do around town. Additionally, hotels are infused with local photography and artwork, highlighting each property’s connection and support to its own community.
Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton California University-Pittsburgh participates in Hilton HHonors®, the only hotel loyalty program that allows members to earn Points & Miles® on the same stay and No Blackout Dates on reward stays. HHonors members always get our lowest price with our Best Price Guarantee, along with HHonors Points, digital check-in and no booking fees only when they book directly through Hilton.
